Russia has jailed more than 200 captured Ukrainian fighters so far - LavrovRussian courts have sentenced more than 200 Ukrainian fighters to prison terms since Moscow started its military operation in Ukraine, Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov said in an interview with the state RIA news agency published on Sunday. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 02:22:49 GMT N3WZPU4UZZLW7NXXNZ25SRMRHY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-has-jailed-more-than-200-captured-ukrainian-fighters-so-far-lavrov-2023-12-31/Reuters世界欧洲
China calls Taiwan president frontrunner a destroyer of peaceChina's government called the frontrunner for Taiwan's next president "confrontational" and a destroyer of peace after he spoke at a presidential debate and said the island's sovereignty and independence belong to its people. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 01:25:53 GMT 5R5CRTRLWROU5IBLIPF5MZXII4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-calls-taiwan-president-frontrunner-peace-destroyer-2023-12-31/Reuters世界亚太地区
US says it shot down 2 missiles launched from Houthi-controlled areasThe United States shot down two missiles headed toward a container ship in the southern Red Sea and launched from Houthi-controlled areas of Yemen on Saturday, U.S. Central Command (CENTCOM) said. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 01:23:56 GMT CSF6H5AYORJYTAZKMMNHHWTMZE https://www.reuters.com/world/us-says-it-shot-down-two-missiles-launched-in-houthi-control-areas-2023-12-31/Reuters世界
'American Idol' star Paula Abdul sues producer Nigel Lythgoe for sexual assaultU.S. singer, dancer and "American Idol" star Paula Abdul filed a lawsuit accusing British television executive Nigel Lythgoe of sexually assaulting her when they worked together on two popular talent shows, according to court documents. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 01:14:06 GMT ASOIPP4WJROZLIVHZH32KPHSXY https://www.reuters.com/legal/american-idol-star-paula-abdul-sues- Producer-nigel-lythgoe- Sex-assault-2023-12-31/Reuters合法的
Netanyahu says Israel must control Gaza's border with Egypt, war to last monthsSuch a move would mark a de facto reversal of Israel's 2005 withdrawal from Gaza, placing the enclave under exclusive Israeli control. Israeli military forces meanwhile pressed ahead with an offensive that the prime minister said would last for months. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 00:49:46 GMT OLHTBSSSM5OMLAFE34QIF3G4EU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/netanyahu-says-israel-must-control-gaza-border-with-egypt-war-last-months-2023-12-31/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Arafat Barbakh, Dan Williams世界中东地区
Mexico restarts repatriating Venezuelans as tensions over migration run highMexico's government has restarted repatriation flights of Venezuelans, it said on Saturday, two days after officials agreed to work more closely with their U.S. counterparts to tackle record migration at their shared border. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 00:43:43 GMT JTCIIKX4SZO4JFC3T7FSCAOOZQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexico-restarts-repatriating-venezuelan-tensions-over-migration-run-high-2023-12-31/Reuters世界美洲
Russian air assaults target Kyiv and Kharkiv, Ukraine saysUkraine's air defense systems in the region surrounding Kyiv were engaged late on Saturday in repelling Russia's drone attack, the military administration of the region said. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 00:39:24 GMT U72QPM3HIJMF5GSCYJ5OMSBCU4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-launches-overnight-air-assault-targeting-kyiv-ukraine-says-2023-12-31/Vitalii Hnidyi世界欧洲
Military-led Sahel states rally thousands to support allianceThe prime ministers of Niger, Burkina Faso and Mali on Saturday affirmed their commitment to a shared future under an alliance that has seen the three junta-led countries distance themselves from the larger West African political bloc since their coups. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 23:35:56 GMT WNOEEB6I2VOL3A2HM6UNJ5OV7M https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/military-led-sahel-states-rally-thousands-support-alliance-2023-12-30/Boureima Balima, Abdel-Kader Mazou世界非洲
Romanians, Bulgarians to fly, sail passport-free to EU from end-March 2024Citizens of European Union members Romania and Bulgaria will no longer need a passport from March 31, 2024 to travel by air or sea to most other EU countries as well as Norway and Switzerland, the council of EU governments said on Saturday. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 23:19:17 GMT E6ZFLDJ4O5I47AOMEYMQ2X5FQE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/romanians-bulgarians-fly-sail-passport-free-eu-end-march-2024-2023-12-30/Reuters世界欧洲
North Korea to launch new satellites, build drones as it warns war inevitableNorth Korea vowed to launch three new spy satellites, build military drones, and boost its nuclear arsenal in 2024 as leader Kim Jong Un said U.S. policy is making war inevitable, state media reported on Sunday. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 22:58:50 GMT FA2XDRIUXJMUBNUAGVLJNI425Y https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-plans-to-launch- Three-more-reconnaissance-satellites-2024-kcna-reports-2023-12-30/Cynthia Kim, Josh Smith, Jack Kim世界亚太地区
Massive waves on California coast cause flooding, force evacuationsCoastal communities in California faced another day of towering waves and possible flooding on Saturday as officials issued evacuation orders in some areas and warned residents to stay off beaches and coastal roadways. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 21:54:43 GMT KADMCP5P4VO3TMZ4SPN4G3HQY4 https://www.reuters.com/world/us/massive-waves-california-coast-cause-flooding-force-evacuations-2023-12-30/Reuters世界美国
